need-connect-permission: I lack the `connect` permission in this voice channel !
need-speak-permission: I lack the `speak` permission in this voice channel !
need-embed-permission-for-goodbye: I lack the `embed links` permission in order to send goodbye messages in this channel.
need-embed-permission-for-welcome: I lack the `embed links` permission in order to send welcome messages in this channel.
need-nsfw-channel-to-be-used: You have to be in a NSFW channel to use this command!
cant-send-pm: I can't send you private messages, try to send me this command in private message.
have-to-be-lover: You have to be Lover on my server to do that!
command-invalid-usage: That doesn't seems like a valid option command. Use `{}` for further information.
role-not-enough-high: Your role is not enough high.
put-the-role-id-instead: Invalid type of command, you have to put the ID of the role, you can find it with
music-no-result: Sorry, this video is not available anymore. Try to use {} to perform an advanced search.
music-no-youtube-live: Don't add youtube live for the moment.
music-playblacklisted: I can't play this video. A word or the URL is blacklisted by the {} command.
music-not-in-dm: Music commands can not be used in DMs. Sorry!
music-not-my-channel: You must be in {} to use this command.
music-longer-than-2-hours: Sorry, I cannot play this song. It exceeds your limit. You have to be Patreon to enqueue song with a duration longer than 2 hours.
music-volume-higher-than-100: You have to be Patron on my server to set a volume higher than 100.
music-when-adding-pl: You cannot add a song when a playlist is already being added...
not-connected: I am not currently connected to voice!
not-playing: I am not currently playing anything.
not-the-right-channel: You have to be in my voice channel to use this command.
bot-disabled-command: You cannot use this command, it's disabled on this server.
bot-karaoke-mod: You cannot use commands on this channel, it's disabled by the karaoke command.
bot-cooldown: You are on cooldown. Try again in
bot-not-mp: This command cannot be used in private messages.
bot-not-enough-permissions: You cannot use this command. You don't have enough permissions.
cmd-clean-help:
Cleans up my messages from the channel.
If you don't specify a search number, 100 messages will be deleted.
cmd-purge-help:
Removes up to (num_msg) messages posted in chat.
If you don't specify a search number, 100 messages will be deleted.
cmd-stfu-help:
Removes up to (num_msg) messages posted in chat from a user.
If you don't specify a search number, 100 messages will be deleted.
cmd-prefix-change-help: Allows to change the current server prefix.
cmd-prefix-reset-help: Resets the server prefix to the global one.
cmd-ignore-help: Disables my commands in the current channel.
cmd-disabledcommand-help: Manages the disabled commands of the server.
cmd-disabledcommand-add-help: Disables a command on the server.
cmd-language-help:
Sets my language.
Available languages can be displayed with language list.
cmd-kick-help: Kicks a user from the server.
cmd-ban-help: Bans a user from the server.
cmd-hackban-help: Bans a user from the server with his ID.
cmd-welcome-welcome_off-help: Disables the welcome message on the channel.
cmd-goodbye-goodbye_off-help: Disables the goodbye message on the channel.
cmd-autorole-help: Sets an autorole (or several) for new members of the server.
cmd-joinclan-help: Allows to get a role. You cannot have multiple clans at the same time.
cmd-clan-add-help: Allows to add a clan to the server, members can join it with joinclan
cmd-clan-delete-help: Allows to delete a clan of the server.
cmd-clan-list-help: Displays the available clans of the server.
cmd-ily-help: If you want to know if I love you.
cmd-roll-help:
Generates a random number between 0 and the max specifed.
Can also generates a random number between two numbers.
Otherwise generates a random number between 0 and 100.
cmd-pic-help: Displays a random picture of me.
cmd-flip-help: Flips a coin if no user is specified, otherwise flip a user.
cmd-dog-help: Displays a random pic of a dog.
cmd-cat-help: Displays a random pic of a cat.
cmd-customcommand-help:
Manages the custom commands of the server.
You can also create your own command, for more informations use help cc add.
- Image links in custom commands are automatically hidden.
cmd-customcommand-add-help:
Allows to add a custom command on the server.
By putting >>> at the beginning, the custom command will run the selected command.
By putting && between commands, every commands are launched together.
cmd-customcommand-raw-help: Displays the real content of a custom command.
cmd-customcommand-edit-help: Allows to edit a custom command that already exist on the server.
cmd-customcommand-delete-help: Allows to delete a custom command on the server.
cmd-ascii-help: Displays a text in ascii art.
cmd-poll-help: Interactively creates a poll with the following question.
cmd-meme-help:
Generates a meme.
It displays your text on the user avatar or on a custom picture.
cmd-osu-help:
Displays informations about an osu! profile
You can choose a mode, if you don't specify any mode, standard is used.
Mode list : Standard, Taiko, Ctb, Mania
cmd-choice-help:
Randomly selects a random option between multiple options.
By putting >>> at the beginning, it will start the selected command.

- Image links in this command are automatically hidden.
cmd-nextep-help: Displays the remaining time before the next episode of an anime.
cmd-weeb-help: Displays my anime commands list. (Powered by weeb.sh)
cmd-help-help: Shows my commands or displays help for a command.
cmd-shard-help: Shows on which shard you currently are.
cmd-avatar-help:
Displays a user avatar.
If you don't specify any user, it displays yours.
cmd-userinfo-help:
Displays informations about a user.
If you don't specify any user, it displays yours.
cmd-roleinfo-help: Displays informations about a role. Warning, this is case sensitive.
cmd-changelog-help:
Displays my last patch notes.
For further informations about old patch notes, visit my official server.
cmd-don-help: Displays informations and links to support me.
cmd-id-help:
Displays the ID of a user.
If you don't specify any user, it displays yours.
cmd-suggestion-help: Sends a suggestion to the developer.
cmd-bug-help: Reports a bug to the developer.
cmd-feedback-help: Sends a feedback about me to the developer.
cmd-giverole-help: Gives a role to an user on the guild.
cmd-setrole-help:
Configures which roles can be obtained with the getrole command.
reset : removes every roles which can be obtained with the getrole command.
now : displays every roles which can be obtained with the getrole command.
cmd-getrole-help: Allows to get a role or to remove it. Warning, this is case sensitive.
cmd-join-help: Summons me into your voice channel or into the specified one.
cmd-play-help: Plays a song with an url or key words.
cmd-karaoke-help: Temporarily avoid the use of the commands in every channel except in the one where the command is used.
cmd-stop-help: Stops the player and clears the queue.
cmd-resume-help: Resumes a song if it is currently paused.
cmd-np-help: Returns some informations about the current song.
cmd-active-help: Displays all my players with their states.
cmd-volume-help:
Sets the playback volume. Accepted values are from 0 to 200.
Putting + or - before the volume will make the volume change relative to the current volume.
If you don't specify any new volume, returns the current volume.
cmd-pl-start-help:
Starts an autoplaylist.
If you don't specify any autoplaylist, it loads yours.
cmd-plstart-help:
Starts an autoplaylist.
If you don't specify any autoplaylist, it loads yours.
cmd-pl-new-help: Creates a new autoplaylist that can be loaded.
cmd-plnew-help: Creates a new autoplaylist that can be loaded.
cmd-pl-info-help: Gives informations about an autoplaylist, if you don't specify one, about the current autoplaylist.
cmd-plinfo-help: Gives informations about an autoplaylist, if you don't specify one, about the current autoplaylist.
cmd-pl-repair-help: Repairs an autoplaylist, if you don't specify one, repairs the current autoplaylist.
cmd-plrepair-help: Repairs an autoplaylist, if you don't specify one, repairs the current autoplaylist.
cmd-lyrics-help:
Displays the lyrics of a song.
If you don't specify any url or key words, it displays the current song lyrics.
It only works if the title of the song is 'Artist - Title', 'Opening' aren't recognized for the moment.
cmd-pladd-help:
Adds a song to the current autoplaylist, if you don't specify an url, adds the current song to the autoplaylist.
You can use keywords to try to add it without url.
cmd-pl-add-help:
Adds a song to the current autoplaylist, if you don't specify an url, adds the current song to the autoplaylist.
You can use keywords to try to add it without url.
cmd-pl-remove-help:
Removes a song to the current autoplaylist, if you don't specify an url, removes the current song from the autoplaylist.
You can use keywords to try to remove it without url.
You can specify the position in the autoplaylist (can be find with plinfo)
cmd-plremove-help:
Removes a song to the current autoplaylist, if you don't specify an url, removes the current song from the autoplaylist.
You can use keywords to try to remove it without url.
You can specify the position in the autoplaylist (can be find with plinfo)
cmd-promote-help:
Promotes a song to the top of the queue.
If you don't specify a position, it will promote the last song in the queue.
cmd-remove-help: Removes a song from the queue.
cmd-playblacklist-help: Management of the play command blacklist.
cmd-playblacklist-list: Displays the blacklisted words and URL for the play command on this server.
cmd-playblacklist-set: Allows to set the blacklisted words and URL for the play command.
cmd-playblacklist-delete: Deletes every blacklisted words and URL on this server.
cmd-setdj-help:
Configures a role as a DJ role (or several). Member with a DJ role can uses every musical commands.
reset : removes the DJ permissions of every role on the server.
now : displays every roles with the DJ permissions.
everyone : grants my DJ permissions to everyone on the server.
cmd-radio-list-help: Displays the list of my available radio stations.
cmd-search-help:
Searches multiple videos at once with the selected parameters.
You can add one of them to the queue. If no service are specified, youtube is selected by default, if no number are specified, three videos are selected.

List of the services: platform where the video is searched :
- youtube (yt) (by default)
- soundcloud (sc)
- yahoo (yh)

note: if your search starts with a number, you should quote your search. -> 'your_search'
cmd-supersearch-help:
Searches even more videos at once with the selected parameters.
You can add one of them to the queue. If no service are specified, youtube is selected by default, if no number are specified, three videos are selected.

List of the services: platform where the video is searched :
- youtube (yt) (by default)
- soundcloud (sc)
- yahoo (yh)

note: if your search starts with a number, you should quote your search. -> 'your_search'
cmd-moveto-help: Moves the song to a specific moment.
cmd-download-help: Allows to create a download link of the current song.
cmd-clean-cleaned-messages: messages were removed in this channel.
cmd-clean-cleaned-message: message was removed in this channel.
cmd-prefix-set-prefix:
Prefix set for this server.
To go back to the normal prefix, do `{}`.

cmd-ignore-commands-enabled: My commands are now enabled on this channel.

cmd-customcommand-raw-no-cc: There are no custom commands in this server. Use {} to start adding some.

cmd-poll-init: Say a poll option to add to the poll or say {} to publish the poll.
cmd-poll-cancelled: Poll cancelled, no options have been said.
cmd-meme-one-user: Please mention only one user at once.
cmd-choice-no-choices: You have to specify more than one option, separated by `|`.
cmd-choice-too-much-cmds: Too much commands at the same time.
cmd-nextep-not-found: I didn't find any results for this anime.
cmd-nextep-not-airing: This anime is not airing anymore!
cmd-slap-yourself: you got a slap from yourself?!
cmd-punch-yourself: you got a punch from yourself?!
cmd-shoot-yourself: I'll not let you do this!
cmd-help-help-not-found: I didn't find any help for this command!
cmd-shard: This server is on the shard {} !
cmd-info:
**About:** ```I'm Hazuki Watora, a bot created by Zenrac#7286 in 2016 with python 3.5.
In 2018 I got fully rewritted from 0 with the rewrite of discord.py on Python 3.6.
I'm mostly a musical bot, but not only! I was totally coded with discord.py. (Thanks to Danny)``````The character Hazuki Watora was drawn/created by Peko, a big part of the pictures in the pic command are from him, the others are some fan art that I found on google. I don't own any of Watora pictures. https://www.zerochan.net/Peko / http://lumino.sakura.ne.jp``````You can get my command list with =help
You can get more informations about permissions with =permsinfo
You can display my special thanks with =credits``````fix
By using me, you accept the fact that I can conserve the history of the used commands.```
cmd-credits-title: List of the people that made this bot possible.
cmd-perms-info:
**Help with permissions:**
```My permissions are mostly based on your server/channel permissions.

Examples :
- You cannot use the ban command if you cannot ban users.
- You cannot use the purge command if you cannot manage messages.

I'll grant you more functionalities if you're alone in a voice channel with me, or if you have DJ permissions.``````fix
DJ permissions :``````They allow to use every musical commands without necessarily having high permissions on the server.

To grant the DJ permissions to someone, you have to give him a DJ role.``````fix
DJ Roles :``````This is a role that allows to use all musical commands by having it, it grants the same permissions in the case of someone alone in a voice channel with me.

You can set a role as a DJ role with the {}setdj command.
A role called DJ is giving DJ permissions by default.```

cmd-feedback-useless: Please don't try to send useless feedback.
